job.title: Salesforce Informatica Data Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: <strong><u>Summary<br><br></u></strong>The Salesforce Informatica Data Engineer will design intelligent, automated data integrations. Bring high-performance, zero code, cloud, and on-prem data integration to scale.<br><br><strong>DUTIES<br></strong><ul><li>Design intelligent, automated data integrations</li><li>Bring high-performance, zero code, cloud, and on-premises data integration to scale </li><li>By scaling up the data ecosystem around Salesforce, we will improve speed and lower the total cost of ownership with data integration</li><li>Implement scalable solutions that handle large amounts of data through ETL migration, integration, and implementation of user-friendly interfaces leveraging Salesforce adaptors and secure agent deployments</li><li>You will improve business process agility and outcomes, drive innovation, and reduce time to market for our innovative IT solutions</li><li>You will work closely with Salesforce Administrators and Developers</li><li>You will also be engaged in our strategic project integrations</li></ul> <strong>REQUIREMENTS<br></strong><ul><li>Bachelor’s Degree</li><li>6 year’s relevant professional experience</li><li>3 years of recent Informatica Cloud, ETL, and Salesforce / Informatica integrations experience</li><li>Certifications in Salesforce and Informatica preferred</li></ul>
